name: ChecklistAssist-HelpMeLeave
0:
”Alexa, open help me leave”
”Alexa, start help me leave”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: help me leave
des: Have Alexa go over the top items you need when leaving your home in the mornings. Sheʻll go over a checklist of everything you'll need for a daily commute to work or class. Not a comprehensive list but one with the essential items most people will need when leaving their home and instead of having to keep track in your head where and what you need, Alexa will remind you and assist on getting you out and on your way. prepared & focused, confident that you have everything to start.. Help me leave
